PERSONA:
meet frank, a 68-year-old divorced white man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region of the united states. despite having only a high school education, frank has managed to maintain a middle-income lifestyle, earning between $40,000 and $50,000 annually.

frank was born and raised in the united states, and he is a citizen. he identifies as a liberal and leans towards the democratic party, although he considers himself an independent voter. frank is not particularly religious, identifying as unaffiliated and never attending religious services.

in his free time, frank enjoys using the internet, though not as frequently as some others. he is not currently involved in any volunteer work, but he is registered to vote and takes his civic duties seriously.

frank's life experiences have shaped his worldview, making him a thoughtful and open-minded individual who values diversity and social progress. while he may not always agree with the mainstream liberal agenda, he believes in equality, justice, and compassion for all.
